import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{supabase}from"../../supabaseClient";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Leaderboard(){const[leaders,setLeaders]=useState([]);const[searchQuery,setSearchQuery]=useState("");// Search input state
